chat.title: Insights
chat.subtitle: Ask questions about your codebase
chat.inputHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line

emptyState.title: Start a Conversation
emptyState.description: Ask questions about your codebase, get suggestions for improvements, or discuss features you'd like to implement.

suggestions.architecture: What is the architecture of this project?
suggestions.features: What features could I add next?

deleteDialog.title: Delete conversation?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete this conversation and all its messages. This action cannot be undone.

notConfigured.title: Graphiti memory is not configured
notConfigured.description: To enable graph memory, set GRAPHITI_ENABLED=true in project settings.

memoryBrowser.title: Memory Browser
memoryBrowser.noMemoriesEmpty: No memories recorded yet. Memories are created during AI agent sessions and PR reviews.
memoryBrowser.noMemoriesFiltered: No memories match the selected filter.
